name: Trichromancy
description:
Trichromancy is a deckbuilding game where each of your characters has their own deck.  Your deck sonsists of cards that can generate mana and other cards that can use the mana for dealing damage.  Mana that is generated can be used by anyone, even the enemies!  You'll need to balance generation of lots of mana in order for you to use big attacks without allowing your enemies to cast big attacks on you with the mana you make.

Each character's turn consists of:

1. Drawing 4 cards (showin in the bottom right)

2. Playing cards until you use all of your action points

3. Ending your turn

Some limitations on how you play cards:

1. You can only play attack cards if the proper mana has been generated

2. You can only play each card from your deck once per turn

3. You must use all of your action points

4. If your character's HP is at or below 0, they are unconcious and cannot play during their turn.

There are "Bonus Actions" available in the bottom center of your screen that are basic mana generators to be used by anyone.  They use 1 AP, but can be used mulitple times per turn.

Win the battle by dealing enough damage to your enemy before they knock out all of your mages.  Good luck!
